subject: World Cup 2010 (Soccer)
World Cup (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Zinédine Zidane of France and Lucas Radebe of South African were to discuss a match between France and South Africa. But that was before the volcano involving the French team erupted.
snippet: Zinédine Zidane of France and Lucas Radebe of South African were to discuss a match between France and South Africa. But that was before the volcano involving the French team erupted.
